short_summary: The procurement of components for packing and harnessing airplane А parts with reference to CA.
full_summary:
# Tender Notice: Pack And Harness Assy
**Reference Number:** CB-686-30850572
**Solicitation Number:** W8485-247824
**Publication Date:** November 1, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** November 17, 2023, at 2:00 pm (EST)

## Description
The Department of National Defence is soliciting bids for the procurement of Pack and Harness Assy items.

### Item Details
| Item # | Part Number | Description | Quantity | Unit of Issue |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | 8927592-1 | Pack and Harness Assy | 15 | Each |

The delivery is requested at the depots named as soon as possible, from Free Carrier Plant to 15 Westwin Ave.

### Requirements
* Bidders must provide an equivalent or substitute product, indicating the Part Number and NCAGE (National Census of Governments Entities)
* Preference will be given to Canadian goods and/or services

### Procurement Details
* Procurement method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Procurement category: Goods and Services
* Trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Centralized Tendering and Contracting
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement

### Document Submission
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada

### Contact Information
* Ryan Duncan, Contracting Officer
* Email: [Ryan.Duncan@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Ryan.Duncan@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (613) 292-9650

### Attachments
* [Tender Notice and Amendment](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23765/rfp-amendment---w8485-247824-c.pdf)
* [Request for Proposal](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23765/w8485-247824-rfp-english.pdf)
* [Demande de projet de marché](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23765/w8485-247824-rfp-french.pdf)

Note: 
The rewritten entry includes the relevant information in a well-structured and easy-to-read format. I have also corrected grammar and spelling errors, rephrased sentences for better clarity, and reformatted the text to adhere to industry standards.

Key changes made:
